completedItems.title: fix: bm25 and update dependencies
completedItems.body:
This PR is a two-fer

- Updates dependencies for react, etc
- Fixes an issue with bm25 where it wont import and run the worker.js worker -- basically just removed the worker since its not very performance sensitive in the way we're using
